# NSSplitView.DividerStyle.thick

**Case**

A thick style divider displays between subviews.

## Declaration

```swift
case thick
```

## Discussion

This style is the default divider style.

## Constants

- **NSSplitView.DividerStyle.thin**: A thin style divider displays between subviews.
- **NSSplitView.DividerStyle.paneSplitter**: A thick style divider with a 3D appearance displays between subviews.
